BillGates.message: Congratulations to President Trump and VP-elect Vance. America is at its strongest when we use ingenuity and innovation to improve lives here in the U.S. and around the world. I hope we can work together now to build a brighter future for everyone.

Thank you @AbiyAhmedAli for your warm welcome during my visit to Ethiopia. I’m inspired by our insightful discussions on Ethiopia’s development progress, and I’m excited by the opportunity to continue supporting our partners to track and accelerate progress in health, agriculture and financial inclusion. @PMEthiopia

Aidan’s work to end polio saved countless lives and touched even more. His optimism and commitment to helping others made him a leader in the field—and a great friend to everyone who knew him. I'm sending my deepest condolences to his family and loved ones during this difficult time.

Thanks to incredible work by Indian experts, a study conducted on the Immediate Kangaroo Mother Care (IKMC) method in India, reveals some amazing findings about saving newborn lives. Such innovations have the potential to save countless lives globally. @narendramodi @JPNadda
I'm glad you could join us at the @Breakthrough Energy Summit! #BESummit24

cz_binance.message: Manus is a new AI agent. Not a crypto.
Manus is slower, but very thorough. Results are good for complex tasks.
Don't buy high AND sell low. 🤷‍♂️

You know how some people say, "oh, he is so lucky that he bought bitcoins so early"?

Well, what you are feeling now is the pain that we had to endure many times before too.

Hold is never easy.
Not a competition. Let's keep building!

CarlosMaslaton.message: Aún corto, debí perforar el #11 y el #12. Salgo hoy con el #11. Estoy preocupado porque tengo una boda este sábado en la Provincia y el traje me queda demasiado suelto. Ya no hay tiempo para arreglos.
Me quedé corto. Tuve que proceder con el agujero #10.

He debido proceder de emergencia esta mañana a perforar, con un cuchillo de punta, los agujeros números #8 y #9 de este cinturón, adquirido en El Corte Inglés de Castellana-Madrid en noviembre de 2019. Soy abogado y fui al colegio nacional, no soy tecnológico y no fui al colegio industrial. No tengo habilidad para este tipo de cosas.
Argentina, el país de la valija. Javier Milei y Karina Milei ya en etapa explícita robando a la vista del público sin importarles más nada que levantarla en pala, todo para ellos.

Romo es un buen político provincial y un gran militante de LLA, uno de los pocos que sobrevivió a las purgas del 2022 y que no pudo ser fusilado por Karina y Kikuchi. Pero este posteo suyo del 2023 marca como hasta él fue engañado por la política económica de Caputo y Milei.

- Bitcoin and global liquidity
- Inflation may not be as bad as you think

Enjoy!

Welcomed good news for millions of people.

Inflation just came in at 2.8% which is lower than expectations.

The real number is even lower.

The Fed should cut rates immediately.

This week I explained why Trump is crashing the economy and proved why inflation is 50% lower than the government is reporting.

Tomorrow I will show data that will expose why the mainstream narrative of a market crash is wrong.

RaoulGMI.message:
Not on holiday yet so I'll allow myself one more thread...

The markets are crazy! NFT are just jpegs! Dog coins! Cat coins! Tesla ! GameStop! 

Everyone is going to get burned! Don't they realize about discounted cash flows?!!! These people are ruining everything! Green energy?!

We are still early in the business cycle (using ISM) and as the ISM rises this year and into next year, crypto will rise with it.

Patience and less drama please! You know the #DFTU rules.
Over time, we just keep climbing the log regression channel. Whether we stay at the man (red) or climb above it by another standard deviation or two remains to be seen as the cycle develops.

Bullish news → Massive dump. Billions liquidated. Market on the edge… then somehow it pumps again.

Manipulation or just bad altcoin picks?

We dig into scams, smart money & psyops: piped.video/quUO16vCxe4?feature…

🇺🇸BREAKING: US inflation drops to 2.8%, coming in below expectations. 

It's also lower than last month's of 3.0%. 

Markets seem to be recovering 📈

🚨JUST IN: Hyperliquid’s HLP Vault has lost over $4M in the past 24h — and counting.

FUD quickly spread around a possible exploit, but Hyperliquid clarified:
 
🔷 No hack or protocol issue
🔷 A single user was liquidated after withdrawing margin
🔷 They still walked away with ~$1.8M in profit

Markets are wild.

🚨 BREAKING: Franklin Templeton files an S-1 to launch an XRP ETF!

In the meantime, the SEC has postponed its decision on several crypto spot ETFs until May 21, 2025, awaiting further updates on potential approval, rejection, or additional delays.

BlackRock CEO Larry Fink warns that nationalistic policies, like deportations, could fuel inflation in the US.

He notes higher cost is expected in the next 6-9 months.

sassal0x.message:
Pro tip for the bull market:

Don't get upset because someone else has made more money than you from crypto

We're all running our own race and comparison is truly the thief of joy - just enjoy the ride instead of coping over things that have no relevance on your life

I won't get into ETH talk too much, until I feel like the protocol roadmap is in a good place. For me it is always protocol first, asset second.

But I think ETH as monetary asset can only succeed if there are people for whom ETH comes first - I hope the Ether Guild will be that!

1/6 The US government prosecutors got caught withholding evidence in @rstormsf's case. They claimed at least $1B was laundered through Tornado Cash. But Chainalysis later admitted they wrongfully attributed over $300M to North Korea. 

The prosecutors hid this mistake because it weakens their case. Here's why this news is essential to Roman's case. ⤵️

- ETH: the native asset (and our theses for ETH's upside)
- Etherealize: our story and mission

(1/2)
